title: Issue 355
summary: So much content - oops, did I say weekly xamarin?

items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #355 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

This is a bumper issue full of great articles and video resources to make up for having missed last week's edition due to unforeseen circumstances.

I hope you enjoy it.

For those in the U.S. I also hope you have a safe and relaxing 4th of July!

Kym
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #355 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

This is a bumper issue full of great articles and video resources to make up for having missed last week's edition due to unforeseen circumstances.

I hope you enjoy it.

For those in the U.S. I also hope you have a safe and relaxing 4th of July!

Kym

items.title: iOS 16 UI Kit for Figma
items.description:
This file contains hundreds of components, templates, demos, and everything else needed to help you start designing for iOS. Each component has been created with the latest version of Auto Layout, supports Component Properties, variants, Light and Dark Mode, and much more.

iOS 16 UI Kit for Figma by Joey Banks
items.description_markdown:
This file contains hundreds of components, templates, demos, and everything else needed to help you start designing for iOS. Each component has been created with the latest version of Auto Layout, supports Component Properties, variants, Light and Dark Mode, and much more.

[**iOS 16 UI Kit for Figma**](https://www.figma.com/community/file/1121065701252736567) by [Joey Banks](https://twitter.com/joeyabanks)

items.title: Eva Icons
items.description:
Eva Icons is a pack of 480 delightful icons available for free. Download Eva Icons to use them in your products for mobile and web apps. Available as SVG, PNG, Web Font and Sketch. Open Source, built by the Nebular team.

Eva Icons by Mary Akveo
items.description_markdown:
Eva Icons is a pack of 480 delightful icons available for free. Download Eva Icons to use them in your products for mobile and web apps. Available as SVG, PNG, Web Font and Sketch. Open Source, built by the Nebular team.

[**Eva Icons**](https://akveo.github.io/eva-icons/#/) by [Mary Akveo](https://twitter.com/akveo_inc)

items.description:

items.title: .NET MAUI UI July: Outlook Clone
items.description:
In the first post for .NET MAUI UI July, Matt Goldman shows how we can use a combination of .NET MAUIâs built in layouts and controls to replicate a familiar UI: the Microsoft Outlook mobile app.

In the first post for .NET MAUI UI July, Matt Goldman shows how we can use a combination of .NET MAUIâs built in layouts and controls to replicate a familiar UI: the Microsoft Outlook mobile app.

items.description:

items.title: .NET MAUI Progressing From a Default Project Part 1 - Adding the View Model
items.description:
This series looks interesting, it is for people familiar with .NET MAUI. This first part looks into putting a View Model behind the default MAUI starter app and some tips to get your environment working.

.NET MAUI Progressing From a Default Project Part 1 - Adding the View Model by Charles Flatt
items.description_markdown:
This series looks interesting, it is for people familiar with .NET MAUI. This first part looks into putting a View Model behind the default MAUI starter app and some tips to get your environment working.

[**.NET MAUI Progressing From a Default Project Part 1 - Adding the View Model**](https://www.softwaremeadows.com/posts/net_maui_progressing_from_a_default_project_part_1_-_adding_the_view_model/) by [Charles Flatt](https://github.com/bladewolf55)

embedded_links.title: **.NET MAUI Progressing From a Default Project Part 1 - Adding the View Model**

items.title: .Net MAUI : Mobile local Storage Preferences using .NET MAUI
items.description:
In .Net MAUI Preferences stores data in key-value pairs and can be easily managed via the Preferences class from Microsoft.Maui.Storage namespace. This article will help you get started with using the namespace.

.Net MAUI : Mobile local Storage Preferences using .NET MAUI by Suthahar Jegatheesan
items.description_markdown:
In .Net MAUI Preferences stores data in key-value pairs and can be easily managed via the Preferences class from Microsoft.Maui.Storage namespace. This article will help you get started with using the namespace.

[**.Net MAUI : Mobile local Storage Preferences using .NET MAUI**](https://www.msdevbuild.com/2022/06/net-maui-store-local-data-with.html) by [Suthahar Jegatheesan](https://twitter.com/jssuthahar)

items.title: Using Dynamic Resources - .NET MAUI 101
items.description:
Dynamic resources allow you to update the values at runtime. That in it's turn, allows you to change the complete look of your .NET MAUI app while running ð¤¯ In this video I walk you through what it is, and how to do it!

Using Dynamic Resources - .NET MAUI 101 by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
Dynamic resources allow you to update the values at runtime. That in it's turn, allows you to change the complete look of your .NET MAUI app while running ð¤¯ In this video I walk you through what it is, and how to do it!

[**Using Dynamic Resources - .NET MAUI 101**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yMhoht9VaTM) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

items.title: Control Reference Bindings (view-to-view) - .NET MAUI 101
items.description:
With .NET MAUI you can directly bind to another control in XAML. For example if you want to create view-to-view dependencies. Use the x:Reference attribute on a Binding, to reach the control you want and bind to the right property. Sounds hard? Check out the video on how to do it!

Control Reference Bindings (view-to-view) - .NET MAUI 101 by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
With .NET MAUI you can directly bind to another control in XAML. For example if you want to create view-to-view dependencies. Use the x:Reference attribute on a Binding, to reach the control you want and bind to the right property. Sounds hard? Check out the video on how to do it!

[**Control Reference Bindings (view-to-view) - .NET MAUI 101**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PH9_bPu-ImQ) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

items.title: Build Your .NET MAUI Android App with GitHub Actions
items.description:
GitHub has the ability to do all kinds of automation. One of which is to set up automated builds of your .NET MAUI app! In this video we will learn about how to setup builds for you .NET MAUI Android app with GitHub Actions!

Build Your .NET MAUI Android App with GitHub Actions by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
GitHub has the ability to do all kinds of automation. One of which is to set up automated builds of your .NET MAUI app! In this video we will learn about how to setup builds for you .NET MAUI Android app with GitHub Actions!

[**Build Your .NET MAUI Android App with GitHub Actions**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GQuQPm40kys) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

embedded_links.title: **Build Your .NET MAUI Android App with GitHub Actions**

items.title: What is the MVVM pattern, What benefits does MVVM have?
items.description:
Do you really need to learn MVVM to start developing apps with XAML frameworks like .NET MAUI, Uno, Avalonia, WPF, or WinUI 3? James breaks down what you know about MVVM, what it is, what it looks like to code without it, why you should learn and use it, and finally, how to take advantage of MVVM in your app!

What is the MVVM pattern, What benefits does MVVM have? by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
Do you really need to learn MVVM to start developing apps with XAML frameworks like .NET MAUI, Uno, Avalonia, WPF, or WinUI 3? James breaks down what you know about MVVM, what it is, what it looks like to code without it, why you should learn and use it, and finally, how to take advantage of MVVM in your app!

[**What is the MVVM pattern, What benefits does MVVM have?**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AXpTeiWtbC8) by [James Montemagno](https://twitter.com/jamesmontemagno)

embedded_links.title: **What is the MVVM pattern, What benefits does MVVM have?**
